tips.title: Tips:
items: Share links have expiry times, please use within the valid period
Links are only visible to users who know the complete URL
You can manage and delete created shares in the share history

history.subtitle: View and manage all your share records

list.title: History Records

delete.noPermission: This share record was created without delete permission and cannot be deleted. Only newly created share records can be deleted.
